00037 /*
00038  * <meta name="usage" content="experimental"/>
00039  *
00040  * Helper class for implementing the DOM NodeList interface.
00041  *
00042  * This class is experimental and subject to change!!
00043  */
00044 
00045 class XALAN_DOM_EXPORT XalanNodeListSurrogate : public XalanNodeList
00046 {
00047 public:
00048 
00049     XalanNodeListSurrogate(const XalanNode&     theNode);
00050 
00051     XalanNodeListSurrogate(const XalanNodeListSurrogate&    theSource);
00052 
00053     virtual
00054     ~XalanNodeListSurrogate();
00055 
00056     XalanNodeListSurrogate&
00057     operator=(const XalanNodeListSurrogate& theSource)
00058     {
00059         m_node = theSource.m_node;
00060 
00061         XalanNodeList::operator=(theSource);
00062 
00063         return *this;
00064     }
00065 
00066     bool
00067     operator==(const XalanNodeListSurrogate&    theRHS) const
00068     {
00069         return m_node == theRHS.m_node ? true : false;
00070     }
00071 
00072     virtual XalanNode*
00073     item(unsigned int   index) const;
00074 
00075     virtual unsigned int
00076     getLength() const;
00077 
00078 private:
00079 
00080     const XalanNode*    m_node;
00081 };
